panels.description: Percentage of time prometheus has been available over the last 30 days
panels.title: Uptime [Last 30 Days]

panels.description: Shows the current error budget burn rate for storage operations. A value > 1 indicates the error budget is being consumed faster than allowed.
panels.title: Storage Error Budget Burn Rate

panels.description: Monitors if Prometheus query error rate is burning error budget too fast
panels.title: Prometheus Query Error SLO

panels.description: Monitors if Prometheus storage error rate is burning error budget too fast
panels.title: Prometheus Storage Error SLO

panels.description: Monitors when Prometheus scrape error SLO is violated
panels.title: PrometheusScrapeErrorSLOViolation

panels.description: Monitors if Prometheus scrape error rate is burning error budget too fast
panels.title: Prometheus Scrape Error SLO

panels.description: Monitors when Prometheus query SLO is violated
panels.title: PrometheusQuerySLOViolation

panels.description: Monitors when Prometheus storage SLO is violated
panels.title: PrometheusStorageSLOViolation

panels.description: Monitors if storage error budget is burning too fast
panels.title: PrometheusStorageErrorBudgetBurn

panels.description: Monitors if query error budget is burning too fast
panels.title: PrometheusQueryErrorBudgetBurn

panels.description: Monitors if scrape error budget is burning too fast
panels.title: PrometheusScrapeErrorBudgetBurn

panels.description: Monitors for high error rates in Prometheus

targets.expr: 100 * sum(rate(prometheus_request_duration_seconds_count{status_code=~"5.."}[1m])) by (namespace, job, route) / sum(rate(prometheus_request_duration_seconds_count[1m])) by (namespace, job, route) > 5

panels.title: HighErrorRate

panels.description: Monitors for high latency in Prometheus queries
panels.title: HighLatencyWarning

panels.description: Monitors for disk space filling up in Prometheus
panels.title: DiskSpaceFilling

panels.description: Monitors for high memory usage in Prometheus pods

targets.expr: sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="prometheus", container!="", image!=""}) by (container) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", namespace="prometheus", resource="memory"}) by (container) * 100 > 80

panels.title: HighMemoryUsage

panels.description: Monitors for high CPU usage in Prometheus pods
panels.title: HighCPUUsage
